description_0: A high-angle view of a highway extending at a diagonal angle from the bottom left corner of the image to the right side of the image. The highway on the right is three lanes wide, there is a feeder road extending toward the highway visible in the bottom right corner of the image. There is a white sedan in the middle lane and a black SUV to the right of it, the vehicles are traveling toward the right side of the image. The highway on the left is also three lanes wide There is an eighteen wheeler with a green cabin and a white semi-trailer at the top of the far right side of the image in the middle lane and a yellow van in the left lane ahead of the eighteen wheeler. Both vehicles are traveling toward the left side of the image. There is are two exit lanes to the right of the highway on the left side of the image. The highways are separated by a short cement barrier. On the far side of the highways is a large number of trees extending across the image. The sky visible at the top of the image above the trees is relatively clear and blue with clouds scattered on the left side of the image.
description_1: A low-angle side view of a gray cement overpass going over two gray roads extending to the right from the bottom left corner of the image, looping back to the left of the image out of view under the overpass. The barrier on the nearside of the roads is made of a gray metal strip with small wooden posts stuck in the ground holding up the metal strip. Between the two roads is a thin cement median with white traffic posts placed along it. The gray overpass extends across the middle of the image from end to end. There is a black truck and a white SUV driving toward the left side of the image. Above the SUV is a street light in the distance. There are trees on the right and left side of the road near and behind the overpass. The trees are visible underneath the overpass, but most of the trees aren't taller than the overpass. The sky taking up the top half of the image is blue with no visible cloud coverage.
